doc.title: First Time Spankings
doc.plot: In each of the three disciplinary scenes, a male youngster receives his first ever spanking (from a man), administered by Jeff Sterne: 1 - Marcus, in the production year a 22 year old Latino, is getting his first spanking from a male - by hand, ping-pong bat, flogger, hand and large paddle (23'57"); 2 - Doug (then 24) gets his first ever spanking from a male, wearing only a jockstrap, standing bend over a chair, producing impressive marks on his naked buttocks - by hand, large paddle, small paddle, brush and belt (21'41"); 3 - Kyle Palmer (then 18 years old, never spanked before) gets the bare-ass spanking he needs - by hand, large paddle and small paddle (13'35")
